# BNB Chain AI Toolkit

> https://github.com/nirholas/bnb-agents

The most comprehensive open-source AI toolkit for BNB Chain, BSC, opBNB, and the Binance ecosystem.

## What It Is

A monorepo with 72+ AI agents, 6 MCP servers (900+ tools), market data, DeFi tools, wallets, and Web3 standards — all for building AI-powered blockchain applications.

## Components

- agents/ — 72+ AI agent definitions (30 BNB Chain + 42 DeFi)
- mcp-servers/ — 6 Model Context Protocol servers
- market-data/ — CoinGecko, DeFiLlama, 200+ news sources
- defi-tools/ — Multi-chain dust sweeper
- wallets/ — Offline-capable wallet operations
- standards/ — ERC-8004 (agent trust) + W3AG (accessibility)

## MCP Servers

- bnbchain-mcp: BNB Chain + EVM operations (100+ tools)
- binance-mcp: Binance.com exchange (478+ tools)
- binance-us-mcp: Binance.US (US compliance)
- universal-crypto-mcp: 60+ networks (100+ tools)
- agenti: Universal EVM + Solana
- ucai: ABI-to-MCP generator (Python)

## More Info

- Documentation: https://github.com/nirholas/bnb-agents/tree/main/docs
- Full context: https://github.com/nirholas/bnb-agents/blob/main/llms-full.txt
